properties.areaDesc: Outer waters from Santa Cruz Island to San Clemente Island to 60 NM offshore including San Nicolas and Santa Barbara Islands; Waters from Pt. Sal to Santa Cruz Island CA and westward 60 nm including San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Point Piedras Blancas to Point Sal from 10 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 3 at 8:35PM PST until January 5 at 9:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
combined seas 12 to 17 feet possible when conditions are worst.

* WHERE...Outer Coastal Waters

* WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday evening.

* IMPACTS...Potentially strong winds may create dangerous sea
conditions which could capsize or damage small and large
vessels.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and combined
seas.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING
